thread.title: Theme park offers Christmas at Harry Potter's Hogwarts
thread.title_full: Theme park offers Christmas at Harry Potter's Hogwarts

title: Theme park offers Christmas at Harry Potter's Hogwarts
text:
CNN Leadership
Celebrate Christmas at Harry Potter's Hogwarts Updated 1431 GMT (2131 HKT) September 30, 2015 10 photos: Harry Potter studios in London Harry Potter fans had to be quick to nab seats at Warner Bros. Studio Tour London's first Christmas-themed "Dinner in the Great Hall" on December 3 . After admiring the entrance to the Great Hall, click through the gallery to see other parts of the studio tour. Hide Caption 1 of 10 10 photos: Harry Potter studios in London Christmas dinner at the Great Hall, shown here on a regular tour day, costs 230 pounds ($349) per person and is for adults only. Hide Caption 10 photos: Harry Potter studios in London The walls of the Great Hall are decorated with statues. Hide Caption 10 photos: Harry Potter studios in London Visitors can walk around a model of Hogwarts Castle. Hide Caption 10 photos: Harry Potter studios in London Visitors can walk down Diagon Alley, the wizarding shopping street district. Hide Caption 10 photos: Harry Potter studios in London Get a peek inside the office of Professor Albus Dumbledore, headmaster at Hogwarts. Hide Caption 6 of 10 10 photos: Harry Potter studios in London The Sorting Hat sits on a shelf in Dumbledore's office. It makes its appearance at the Great Hall to decide where new students will live at school. Hide Caption 10 photos: Harry Potter studios in London The potions classroom is also on the tour. Hide Caption 8 of 10 10 photos: Harry Potter studios in London See Death Eater costumes, which seem almost as eerie as when they come alive as followers of Lord Voldemort. Hide Caption 9 of 10 10 photos: Harry Potter studios in London The tour includes part of the set used for shots on a wooden bridge at Hogwarts. Hide Caption
